chunk:
Beauty Pie Superdrops Brightening Niacinamide

Brand: Beauty Pie

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Niacinamide, Glycereth-26, Butylene Glycol, Methyl Gluceth-20, Glycerin, Alcohol, Diglycerin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Enantia Chlorantha Bark Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Tropaeolum Majus Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Surfactin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Oleanolic Acid

Directions: Each morning and/or evening, massage 5-6 drops onto a clean face, neck and d collet for a brightening, oxygenating skin boost. Follow with serum, moisturizer and/or sunscreen.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
